All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CashRegister
Overrides the `getJsonId()` method to generate a JSON-compatible ID for the product.
Cls
A class with a static method to clear the console screen
Customer
This class represents a customer of the store.
CustomerDemo
 
CustomerFileDemo
 
CustomerManagement
This class provides methods for managing customers in a retail system.
Discount
The Discount class represents a discount applied to a product or purchase.
DiscountReceipt
The DiscountReceipt class extends the Receipt class to represent a receipt with a discount applied.
Employee
The Employee class represents an employee in a retail system.
EmployeeManagement
 
FunctionCaller
 
IdTracking
The IdTracking class is used to generate unique IDs for different entities in the system.
JsonIdentifiable
 
Loyalty
The Loyalty class manages a customer's loyalty points and rewards discounts.
LoyaltyAccount
The LoyaltyAccount class extends the Loyalty class to represent a customer's loyalty account, including an account number.
Main
The Main class is the entry point of the application.
ObjectJson
The ObjectJson class provides methods for serializing and deserializing objects to and from JSON format.
OfferManagement
The OfferManagement class provides methods for managing offers in a retail system.
Offers
The Offers class extends the Discount class to represent an offer applied to a product.
Payment
The Payment class represents a payment made by a customer in a retail system.
Product
The Product class represents a product in a retail system.
ProductList
 
ProductManagement
 
Receipt
The Receipt class represents a receipt in a retail system.
ReceiptGenerator
 
RewardsCustomer
The RewardsCustomer class extends the Customer class to represent a customer with a loyalty account.
Round
The Round class provides a utility method for rounding a double value to two decimal places.
Test

Transaction
The Transaction class represents a individual product transaction in a retail system.
TransactionList
The TransactionList class represents a list of transactions in a retail system.
TransactionManagement
The TransactionManagement class provides methods for managing transactions in a retail system.
